name: The Lost Mummy
description:
The Lost Mummy Murky the Mummy wants to get to his coffin. But you know how pyramids are. Trapdoors everywhere, booby traps where you don't want them, raiders trying to pillage your sleeping place. Every evening is an adventure. Oh and don't forget to get some toilet paper to make your skin tougher. CONTROLS

Click on things :)

CREDITS
  • Programming & Level Design - Brin Žvan
  • Programming & Sound - Derek Golliher
  • Art - Vita Potočnik
